title: ImageRotateDrawingAxis
name: ImageRotateDrawingAxis
description: Rotates all subsequent drawing on a image at a specified point by a specified angle.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x
arguments.description: The x coordinate for the point of rotation. The default value is 0.

arguments.name: y
arguments.description: The y coordinate for the point of rotation. The default value is 0.
